detail_desc: Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with moss-knit stripes, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Front and back pockets and lace trims at the hems.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide panel and concealed key pocket.

Short running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. Reflective details. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

3/4-length sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with a mesh section at the back and ribbed hems. The trousers are made partly from recycled polyester.

Top and cardigan in soft cotton. Short-sleeved top in jersey with a rounded lace collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Fine-knit cardigan with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Top and cardigan in soft cotton. Short-sleeved top in jersey with a rounded lace collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Fine-knit cardigan with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Ribbed top in an airy viscose blend with a V-neck, lacing at the front, dropped shoulders and short cap sleeves.
Double-breasted jacket in a striped weave with peak lapels, jetted front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Fitted skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high, pleated paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.

Waist belt in imitation suede with decorative metal details and an antiqued metal buckle with an adjustable section at the front. Width 2.5 cm.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.

Mittens with pompoms and a motif with a front flap that can be fastened back to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves. Ribbed, foldover cuffs.
